page.title: 18Recreation
page.content: There are plenty of opportunities for recreation in the Soulbury/Linslade area. People enjoy gardening and the Rambling Association walks the public footpaths. We are just on the edge of a country park, enabling people to ride and hunt in te area and we also have an eighteen hole golf course. A major amenity is the canal with its boat hire company- 250 families start their holidays in Linslade each year on the longboats. There is a trip-boat carrying up to 10,000 people a year from Linslade to Three Locks. The canal enables us to have an active angling club and canoeing club in our area and up to 300 people can be found jogging and walking along the towpath at weekends. We also have a private squash and tennis club in this area.Children ride BMX bikes and skate boards along the pavements.
